text: Jönssonligan på Mallorca (The Johnson Gang in Mallorca - International: English title) is a Swedish film made in 1989, and is one of a series about a criminal gang called Jönssonligan. This was the last film in the series where Gösta Ekman played the part of Sickan. ==Cast== *Gösta Ekman as Charles-Ingvar 'Sickan' Jönsson *Björn Gustafson as Dynamit-Harry *Ulf Brunnberg as Ragnar Vanheden *Birgitta Andersson as Doris *Per Grundén as Morgan Wall-Enberg *Margaretha Krook as Gertrude Germann *Dan Ekborg as Gren *Kent Andersson as Persson *Johann Neumann as Ödlan *Roland Janson as Brother == External links == * * Category:Jönssonligan films Category:1989 films Category:Swedish comedy films Category:Films set in Spain Category:Films directed by Mikael Ekman Category:Swedish films
title: Jönssonligan på Mallorca
